sailpoint.object

Class QueryInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.object.QueryInfo

  • public class QueryInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a light-weight representation of a query that is intended for consumption by suggest components and/or LCM rules that communicate with suggest components. Unlike QueryOptions, this class carries data regarding whether or not a query is supposed to return anything. This facilitates logic in suggest components that determines whether a query should be executed or an empty Collection should be returned.

    • Constructor Detail

      • QueryInfo

        public QueryInfo(QueryOptions qo)
        Construct a QueryInfo object from the specified QueryOptions
        Parameters:
        qo - QueryOptions used to construct this QueryInfo. Note that if more than one Filter exists on the QueryOptions the list will be 'anded' into a single Filter

      • QueryInfo

        public QueryInfo(Filter filter,
         boolean isReturnNone)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Parameters:
        filter - Filter used in the query represented by this QueryInfo
        isReturnNone - true if this QueryInfo represents a query that should not return anything; false otherwise. Note that this cannot be set to true unless the Filter is null because it is intended to disambiguate that case. If a non-null Filter is passed in and this is set to true, an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isReturnNone is set to true but a non-null filter is passed in

    • Method Detail

      • getFilter

        public Filter getFilter()
        Returns:
        Filter used in the query that this object represents

      • isReturnAll

        public boolean isReturnAll()
        Returns:
        true if the query represented by this object is returning all the objects of the type that is being queried; false otherwise

      • isReturnNone

        public boolean isReturnNone()
        Returns:
        true if the query represented by this object should not return anything; false otherwise
